name: Sonata Last.fm Album Art Fetcher
short_description: This plugin is for the Sonata mpd client to download album art from last.fm. I realized the currently used Rhapsody downloader doesn't really work, so I made this one. It can be installed as a normal plugin, or as a built-in plugin, in place of the rhapsody covers file. A patch is included to accomplish this.
summary: A plugin for the Sonata mpd music client to download album art.
